titleStmt.title: Contemplations vpon the historicall part of the Old Testament. The eighth and last volume. In two bookes. By I.H. deane of Worcester
Contemplations upon the principall passages of the Holy Storie. Vol. 8
titleStmt.author: Hall, Joseph, 1574-1656.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M. Flesher for Nath. Butter,

notesStmt.note: The first volume was issued under the title: Contemplations upon the principall passages of the holie storie.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
